content.rendered:
Radically transform your thinking for both speed and accuracy. Think quickly on your feet to solve problems, overcome obstacles, and win arguments.

  • Think critically
  • Deconstruct situations
  • Analyze deeply
  • Never be fooled

How to Think is not a common “think smarter” book. It starts from biological bases of analytical thinking, and how we can re-program ourselves for deep insight. This book provides real, actionable tool after tool, because smart thinking is all about HOW, and not why or what. The bottom line is that you’ll be able to apply this book’s thinking models immediately, until they become habit.
